_source.text: A 5 1/4" woofer should be minimum but none may fit - you might need to go to a 4" model Look for a wood or metal cabinet - more rigid / usually sound better than plastic speakers You may need to look at metal indoor / outdoor speakers - they tend to be smaller If there is a port, it should face forward so the sound isn't trapped behind the speaker Bass will require sub - for a super budget sub look at Amazon's Polk subs - OK for $100
